feynman_higgs_prod_ttH_gg_t-channel:
\feynmandiagram [small, vertical=a to c] {
            % higgs production, ttH, t-channel
            gi1 [particle=g]
            -- [gluon] a [dot],
            qf1 [particle=t] -- a,
            a -- b [dot],
            b -- [scalar] H [particle=H],
            b -- c [dot],
            gi2 [particle=g]
            -- [gluon] c
            -- qf2 [particle=t],

            % invisible helper lines for layout
            gi1 -- [draw=none] ih1 -- [draw=none] gi2,
            qf1 -- [draw=none] fh1 -- [draw=none] fh2 -- [draw=none] qf2,
            qf1 -- [draw=none] H,
            H -- [draw=none] qf2,
            };
feynman_higgs_prod_VBF_t-channel:
\feynmandiagram [small, vertical=a to c] {
    % higgs production, VBF, t-channel
    qi1 [particle=q]
    -- a [dot],
    a -- qf1 [particle=q],
    a -- [boson, edge label=V] b [dot],
    b -- [scalar] H [particle=H],
    b -- [boson, edge label=V] c [dot],
    qi2 [particle=q]
    -- c
    -- qf2 [particle=q],

    % invisible helper lines for layout
    qi1 -- [draw=none] ih1 -- [draw=none] qi2,
    qf1 -- [draw=none] fh1 -- [draw=none] fh2 -- [draw=none] qf2,
    qf1 -- [draw=none] H,
    H -- [draw=none] qf2,
    };
feynman_single_top_t_4flavor:
\begin{tikzpicture}
          \begin{feynman}
            \diagram [vertical=a to b, small] {
            % draw t-channel qg->qtb
            i1 [particle=\(q\)]
            -- [fermion] a
            -- [fermion] f1 [particle=\( q\)],

            a
            -- [boson, edge label=\(W\)] b,
            %-- [fermion, edge label=\(b\)] c,


            % outgoing top and bottom quarks
            f2 [particle=\(b\)]
            -- [fermion] c
            -- [fermion, edge label=\(b\)] b
            -- [fermion]  t [particle=\(t\)]],

            i2 [particle=\(g\)]
            -- [gluon] c,


            % invisible helper lines for layout
            f2 -- [draw=none] t,
            f1 -- [draw=none] h1  -- [draw=none] t,

            i1 -- [draw=none] h2 -- [draw=none] h3 -- [draw=none] i2,
            };
          \end{feynman}
        \end{tikzpicture}
feynman_ttbb_gg_FSR_t-channel:
\feynmandiagram [small, vertical=a to c] {
            % ttbb production, t-channel
            gi1 [particle=g]
            -- [gluon] a [dot],
            qf1 [particle=t] -- [fermion] a,
            a -- [fermion] b [dot],
            b -- [gluon, edge label=g] addgluon,
            b --  [fermion] c [dot],
            gi2 [particle=g]
            -- [gluon] c
            --  [fermion] qf2 [particle=t],

            b1 [particle=b] -- [fermion] addgluon -- [fermion] b2 [particle=b],

            % invisible helper lines for layout
            gi1 -- [draw=none] ih1 -- [draw=none] gi2,
            qf1 -- [draw=none] addgluon -- [draw=none] qf2,
            qf1 -- [draw=none] ih2 -- [draw=none] b1,
            qf2 -- [draw=none] ih3 -- [draw=none] b2,
            b1 -- [draw=none] b2,
            };
feynman_ttH_gg2ttHbb:
\feynmandiagram [small, vertical=a to c] {
            % ttbb production, t-channel
            gi1 [particle=g]
            -- [gluon] a [dot],
            qf1 [particle=t] -- a,
            a -- b [dot],
            b -- [scalar, edge label=H] higgs,
            b -- c [dot],
            gi2 [particle=g]
            -- [gluon] c
            -- qf2 [particle=t],

            b1 [particle=b] -- higgs -- b2 [particle=b],

            % invisible helper lines for layout
            gi1 -- [draw=none] ih1 -- [draw=none] gi2,
            qf1 -- [draw=none] higgs -- [draw=none] qf2,
            qf1 -- [draw=none] ih2 -- [draw=none] b1,
            qf2 -- [draw=none] ih3 -- [draw=none] b2,
            b1 -- [draw=none] b2,
            };
